text: Bryan Douglas (born 27 May 1934) is an English former footballer. He also earned 36 caps and scored 11 goals for England. He appeared in two World Cups, in 1958 and 1962, appearing in all of England's matches in the two tournaments. In February 2019 he was one of the first seven players to be added into the club's Hall of Fame.Rovers legends inducted into Hall of Fame www.rovers.co.uk, 17 July 2019 ==References== ==Other websites== *Blackburn Legend: Bryan Douglas Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Blackburn Rovers F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Lancashire
title: Bryan Douglas
